short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to interact with the SigVer Manager Chrome App.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension was created in addition to the SigVer Manager chrome application. You'll need the application to use this extension.

It allows the user to directly interact from chrome with the application.
This extension open a pop-up window that allows the user to launch the application, start the signaling server, stop it and close the application.
If the application is not installed, an alert will be raised.
